Package com.compendium.ui.tags

Class Summary
CheckNode this class hoolds data for the tag tree nodes.
UIDraggableTreeCellRenderer This class create a stencil icon which can be dragged and creat a node.
UITagsListTableModel This class is the table model for the JTable in list views.
UITagTreeGroupPopupMenu This draws a small popup menu for right-clicks on a UITextArea.
UITagTreeLeafPopupMenu This draws a small popup menu for right-clicks on a UITextArea.
UITagTreePanel Draws the panel for assigning codes.
UITagTreePopupMenu This draws a small popup menu for right-clicks on a UITextArea.
UITagUsageDialog Class UICodeNodePanel, displays the nodes a given code has been assigned to.
UIWorkingList This class controls the tags working table area.
